Ph.D. student in Innovation Management at the University of Siena with a focus on collaboration networks between universities and companies in science and technology in high-tech industries.

Visiting Ph.D. student at Lunds Universitet under the SWINNO project, analyzing networks of innovations through patents and products in the Swedish ICT sector.
